Spreading module

Eliot J. B. McIntire

February 02 2018

Download fire spread module

  • Lets start with a simple spreading module
library(SpaDES)
tmpdir <- file.path(dirname(tempdir()), "Modules")
downloadModule("fireSpreadLcc", path = tmpdir)
